import '../../App.css' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import useHome from '../Hooks/useHome' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import axios from 'axios' export default ()=>{ const storedata = useSelector(abc=>abc.datareducer.textData) || [] const [todo, setTodo] = useState([]) const [update, setUpdate] = useState('') // const [todo, setTodo] = useState([]) // const [todo, setTodo] = useState([]) const [editCheck, setEditCheck] = useState(false) const [text, setAdd] = useState('') const [editData, setEdit] = useState('') const {addform, editform, editrow, delrow} = useHome(addData, editData, setEditCheck, storedata, setEdit) useEffect(()=>{ axios.get('/get-todo') .then((res)=>setTodo(res.data)) .catch((err)=>console.log(err)) }) const addupdate = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() if(update == ''){ axios.post('/save-todo', {addData}) .then((res)=>{ console.log(res.data) setAdd('') }) .catch((err)=>console.log(err)) } } return <>
